Description: The following statement contains a magic number: for (; ; )              {                  var next = value.IndexOf("\x1b-"' index);                  if (next == -1)                  {                      Console.Write(value.Substring(index));                      return;                  }                  Console.Write(value.Substring(index' next - index));                  index = next + 3;                  Console.ForegroundColor=(ConsoleColor)value[next + 2];              }
